title: 3 Ways to Quickly and Easily Evolve Pawmo in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet

steps.title: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode by tapping R.
steps.content: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode by tapping R. Make sure Pawmo is the first Pokémon in your party, otherwise it won't get sent out when you enter Let's Go mode.

steps.title: Walk 1,000 steps with your Pawmo.
steps.content: Walk 1,000 steps with your Pawmo. There is no step tracker in the game, so knowing when you've taken 1,000 steps can be a bit tricky. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Level up Pawmo.
steps.content: Level up Pawmo. You can level up Pawmo using a Rare Candy or by getting experience through battling. Pawmo will not evolve if you use auto battles to gain experience.

steps.title: To evolve Pawmo effectively, use one of the methods below.
steps.content: To evolve Pawmo effectively, use one of the methods below. These methods will help you easily track when you've hit the 1,000 step marker so you know when to level up your Pawmo to evolve it.

steps.title: Travel to Poco Path and head to the lighthouse.
steps.content: Travel to Poco Path and head to the lighthouse. The lighthouse is at the north end of the route. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode.
steps.content: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode.

steps.title: Go to the top of the lighthouse.
steps.content: Go to the top of the lighthouse.

steps.title: Run around the top of the lighthouse 7 times.
steps.content: Run around the top of the lighthouse 7 times. Other users have found that running around the top of the lighthouse 7 times equals about 1,000 steps, which is exactly enough to evolve Pawmo. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Level up Pawmo.
steps.content: Level up Pawmo. If you did this method correctly, Pawmo should evolve into Pawmot.

steps.title: Find an open area in a city.
steps.content: Find an open area in a city. Look for a spot without items that Pawmo could get stuck on. Avoid areas with wild Pokémon to avoid entering battles.

steps.title: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode.
steps.content: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode.

steps.title: Run for two minutes straight.
steps.content: Run for two minutes straight. If Pawmo goes back into its Poké Ball you must send it back out, as it won't evolve if it's not in Let's Go mode. If Pawmo retreats to its ball, you may need to run longer than two minutes to ensure you've gotten enough steps.

steps.title: Level up Pawmo.
steps.content: Level up Pawmo. Pawmo should evolve into Pawmot if you did this method correctly.

steps.title: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode.
steps.content: Send out Pawmo in Let's Go mode.

steps.title: Get on Koraidon or Miraidon.
steps.content: Get on Koraidon or Miraidon. You must have unlocked the ability to ride Koraidon in Pokémon Scarlet or Miraidon in Pokémon Violet, which occurs once you leave the Academy for the first time and get all three main questlines.

steps.title: High jump on top of any Pokémon Center.
steps.content: High jump on top of any Pokémon Center. You can unlock high jumping on Koraidon or Miraidon after defeating the Lurking Steel Titan.

steps.title: Let Pawmo run around.
steps.content: Let Pawmo run around. Pawmo will run around the perimeter of the Pokémon Center while you're on top of it, looking for you. These steps count towards the 1,000 step count, though this method could take up to 10 minutes to complete.

steps.title: Level up Pawmo.
steps.content: Level up Pawmo. If your Pawmo took enough steps, it should evolve into Pawmot.
